relationships.description: Ron asked Harry for help and information about what happened to him.
Ron also asked Hermione for help and information about what happened to him.
Harry provided Ron with some information, but it is not clear if he fully explained the situation.
Hermione looked at Harry when he suggested she explain what happened, indicating a relationship between them.
